item.title: Seamstress (Level 5)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Architect (Level 2)
item.description: Added a submodule to a repository.

item.title: Apprentice Miller (Level 3)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 575 times with git add -p.

item.title: Apprentice Investigator (Level 3)
item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Apprentice Miller (Level 2)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 542 times with git add -p.

item.title: Master Collector (Level 7)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Worker (Level 3)
item.description: Cloned submodule repository and checked out commits specified by superproject.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 9)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Apprentice Thug (Level 3)
item.description: Forced pushed a branch with git push -f

item.title: Apprentice Pilgrim (Level 1)
item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: Weaver
item.description: Investigate old branches by using git reflog

item.title: Apprentice Miller (Level 1)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 443 times with git add -p.

item.title: Apprentice Architect (Level 3)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Merchant (Level 4)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 7)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Banker (Level 5)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Product Manager (Level 6)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Master Author (Level 8)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Master Historian (Level 9)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Apprentice Archivist (Level 1)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch
